title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck
title_original: EVALESS Womens Sweaters V Neck Long Sleeve Quarter Zip Collared Ribbed Knit Dressy Casual Pullover Sweaters Outfits

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater fits true to size and appreciate its contrasting colors, with one noting the black accents make it pop. The garment is soft, comfortable, and warm enough for winter, while being versatile enough for both office and casual wear. The material quality receives mixed feedback, with some finding it nice while others describe it as rough.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely love this sweater!
items.body: The ribbed knit is soft and flattering, and the quarter zip gives it a cute, stylish touch. Perfect for casual days or dressing up a bit. Cozy, comfortable, and great quality. highly recommend! Read more
items.author: sandra cruz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfortable
items.body: I really like this sweater. It’s a little thicker and warmer than I what I was expecting. Making it perfect for the cooler fall weather. I ordered the navy and it looks like the pictures. The fit is just right; I’m 6’ and 153 lbs, and the medium fits perfectly. The sweater is good quality. I’ve ordered a couple of other sweaters from them, and they either all been great as well. Read more
items.author: Rita

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars I wish they made size XS
items.body: This is a very nice sweater. It's soft, pretty and casual. Unfortunately, I am returning it because a size Small is too large for me and a XS is not an option. Read more
items.author: J. Harris

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars quality constructed pullover top
items.body: I really love everything I get in this brand. This pull over is very comfortable and quality made. The sizing is true to size, even in plus sizing. The fabric is soft and the top fits plenty long. The zipper glides smoothly. Overall, this is a quality shirt I've enjoyed wearing on these colder days. Read more
items.author: Laceysue

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ready for fall
items.body: Looking forward to the weather to get a little cooler so I can wear this. Fabric is soft and the color is spot-on with what I see on my screen; not peachy or orangey like you sometimes get when you're expecting pale pink. I got the regular size I get in this brand, although I might have been able to go down one more. The zipper comes down a good bit but doesn't go too low, which is nice. Sleeves are plenty long enough, which I tend to have an issue with but others might not. Bust - 41" Waist - 35" Hip - 42" Read more
items.author: SusanSays

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!
items.body: This sweater is beautiful! The colors are perfect for Fall and Winter and the material is extremely soft. The fit is very flattering and the black accent colors really make it pop. The fit is true to size, and it's a new go to for cooler weather. I love it! Read more
items.author: Jamie R

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: Cute sweater. Heavy. Comfortable. Made well. I’m 5’2” and 150. Bought a Large. Fits well other than the sleeves have to be rolled up, but I’m ok with that. I bought black and green. Black is blah, nothing special. Green is nice. I think I’ll keep it. Read more
items.author: Mom of 3

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars so cute
items.body: Love this sweater! I got the pink in a large and it’s perfect — soft, flattering, and that quarter zip gives it a cute, polished look. It’s comfy enough for lounging but dressy enough to wear out. Great quality and such a pretty color! Read more
items.author: J. Sullivan

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Blackish Green, Pink, Beige, Chicory Coffee, Black, Navy Blue, Oatmeal, Dark Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
